item.title: European Natural Gas Prices Slip, But Stay Elevated Due to Cold Weather Forecasts
item.description: European natural gas prices fell in volatile trading amid colder-than-average weather forecasts for the next two weeks.

item.title: Stock Futures Tick Higher While U.S. Steel Stock Drops
item.description: Stock futures edged higher, led by a rebound in Tesla and chip stocks, while overseas markets were mixed.

item.title: The Stock Market Is Like a Fashion Show, and Here's One of Its Hot Must-Haves
item.description: Software companies are touting something called the “Rule of 40,” but some are more flash than substance.

item.title: Dollar Falls Are Likely to Be Short-Lived

item.title: Tesla's Car Business Isn't Really in the Driver's Seat
item.description: The majority of EV maker’s market cap rides on hope for robotaxis, robots and AI, but the stock is now at a sharp premium even compared with other tec...
